pinyin: wǒ zuótiān mǎi le yī tiáo yùsǎo

en: This fish is too oily.
pinyin: zhège yùsǎo tài yóu le

en: Do you like to eat fish?
pinyin: nǐ xǐhuān chī yùsǎo ma?

en: Studying hard helps to restrict the release of enzymes.
pinyin: hǎo hǎo xuéxí yǒu zhù yú xiànzhì méng de shìfàng.

en: Restriction enzymes play an important role in this process.
pinyin: xiànzhì méng zài zhège guòchéng zhōng bànyǎn zhe zhòngyào de juésè.

en: This restriction enzyme can only act on specific DNA sequences.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xiànzhì méng zhǐ néng zuòyòng yú tèdìng de DNA xùliè.

en: He secluded himself in the mountains to practice and escape from the noise of the world.
pinyin: tā zài shān lín zhōng yǐn yì xiū xíng, yuǎn lí fēn rǎo de chén shì.

en: Her paintings are full of a sense of seclusion.
pinyin: tā de huà zuò zhōng chōng mǎn zhe yǐn yì zhī qì.

en: This garden is like a secluded paradise that makes people feel relaxed and comfortable.
pinyin: zhè gè huā yuán xiàng yí gè yǐn yì de shì wài táo yuán yī yàng, ràng rén gǎn jué qīng sōng zì zài.

en: Wow, the food at this restaurant is really amazing!
pinyin: Hǎo ya, zhè jiā cānguǎn de cài zhēnshi dǐng bàng!

en: His speech was simply brilliant, and everyone was moved by his eloquence.
pinyin: Tā de yǎnjiǎng jiǎnzhí shì dǐng bàng, dàjiā dōu bèi tā de yǎnshuō dǎdòng le.

en: Your new hairstyle is so amazing and looks great!
pinyin: Nǐ de xīn fàxíng fēicháng dǐng bàng, zhēnshi tài hǎokàn le!

en: A little bit of vanilla extract was added to the delicious cupcakes.
pinyin: Hǎo chī de xiǎo dàngāo lǐ jiā le yī diǎn er xiāngcǎojīng.

en: There is also vanilla extract in the bread my mother baked, it smells very fragrant.
pinyin: Wǒ māmā kǎo de miànbāo lǐ yě yǒu xiāngcǎojīng, wén qǐlái hěn xiāng.

en: This dessert requires vanilla extract to have a better taste.
pinyin: Zhè zhǒng tiándiǎn xūyào xiāngcǎojīng cáinéng yǒu gèng hǎo de wèidào.

en: The curious kitten bit a pufferfish in the river.
pinyin: hǎo qí xīn de xiǎo māo yǎo le yī kǒu hé lǐ de tún yú

en: He had eaten pufferfish before, but dare not eat it again.
pinyin: tā céng jīng chī guò tún yú, dàn shì bù gǎn zài chī le

en: There are many delicacies made of pufferfish in the southern coastal regions of China.
pinyin: Zhōng guó de nán fāng yán hǎi dì qū yǒu hěn duō yòng tún yú zhì zuò de měi shí

en: The past cannot be changed, but we can pursue our future; what it is to envy anyone who can write poems as good as the Three Wills of Wei?
pinyin: wǎng zhě bù kě jiǎn, lái zhě yóu kě zhuī; dé wéi biān sān jué, hé suǒ mù zhī?

en: Folklore holds that it is a bad omen when a bird loses its feathers, but in fact, it can also be due to follicle issues that cause them to shed subcutaneous fat.
pinyin: mín jiān rèn wéi niǎo ér diào le yǔ máo shì huài zhào tóu, shí jì shàng tā men yě huì yīn wèi tǐ nèi máo náng wèn tí ér diào pí xià zhī fá.

en: Hidden in the grass by the shoreline was a huge bird's nest, and the young birds spreading their wings inside were immediately transformed into adorable playthings.
pinyin: àn biān de cǎo zhōng, cáng zhe yī gè jù dà niǎo cháo, zhǎn chì de yòu niǎo zài qí zhōng dùn shí chéng le kě ài de wán jù.

en: Let's go play in Huangshi Gang District!
pinyin: wǒ men qù huáng shí gǎng qū wán ba!

en: The port in Huangshi Gang District is an important cargo distribution center.
pinyin: huáng shí gǎng qū de gǎng kǒu shì yí gè hěn zhòng yào de huò wù jí sàn dì.

en: Huangshi Gang District is a lively and culturally rich place.
pinyin: huáng shí gǎng qū shì yí gè chōng mǎn huó lì hé wén huà fēn wéi de dì fāng.
